settings.note: PLEASE CHECK TROUBLESHOOTING OR CONTACT OUR SUPPORT TO RETRIEVE YOUR RMA NUMBER.

settings.title: Please erase all your personal data and restore your device to factory settings before giving it to us.
When we receive your device, we'll irreversibly remove all your data again.
We will not have any access to personal data on customer devices.
How long will it take for Phone (1) to be repaired?
settings.answer: The repair process will take 3-5 working days, excluding logistics. Reminder: 1. If the product has been found to have quality issues after the repair, Nothing will cover the shipping fee. (In-Warranty)2. If the product issues were found to be man-made after the repair, the user will cover the shipping fee. (Out-of-Warranty)

settings.title: How do I find the nearest Service Centre?
settings.answer: Please contact our Customer Support to assist you in finding the closest Service Centre.

settings.title: What's the price of spare parts for Phone (1)?
settings.answer: Please contact Customer Support to have your phone diagnosed. After this, we can give a quotation for the price of spare parts.

settings.title: How do I fix an issue for Phone (1)?
settings.answer: Please contact Customer Support to diagnose any issues with your Phone (1).

settings.title: How to track the status of the repair?
settings.answer: Please click on this link and input the required information to track the status of the repair.Note: Tracking the repair status are for those who applied online.

settings.title: How do I know if my Phone (1) is eligible for In Warranty repair?
settings.answer: During your Phone (1) warranty period, Nothing will provide free repair service for the phone unless thereâ€™s any unauthorized disassembly, liquid damage, or other physical damage. The eligibility with the warranty shall be subject to the service centre inspection.
